descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar will develop criteria for thinking about dance. Through discussion and written assignments the class will explore diverse perspectives in responding to dance performance/events. Students will be challenged to experience a wide range of forms, styles, and venues.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Critique and use concepts to respond to dance performances. Differentiate taste and judgement in responding to dance. Become articulate about the elements of dance. Assess personal preferences in responding to dance experiences.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Live and digital performance viewing, lecture/discussion.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Participation in discussion and critiques, written assignments, and reflection paper.
